title: Ben Affleck has coffee date with blonde hours before 'sobriety slip'
text:
Ben Affleck was spotted enjoying a coffee date with musician Katie Cherry in Los Angeles on Saturday, hours before she escorted him out of a party following a 'sobriety slip.

In photographs obtained exclusively by MailOnline, the 47-year-old actor is seen looking relaxed as he sits down with his companion over an iced beverage.

The pair made a stop at a local Starbucks coffee house after riding in on his motorcycle, months after his split from TV producer Lindsay Shookus.

Coffee date: Ben Affleck was spotted enjoying a coffee date with musician Katie Cherry in Los Angeles on Saturday, hours before she escorted him out of a party following a 'sobriety slip

The Hollywood screen star looked casually cool for the low-key outing, sporting a multicoloured motorcycle jacket with dark rinse jeans.

Ben and his companion rested their safety helmets on the ground as they sat down together at their table for a quite one-on-one chat.

Us Weekly, who identified the woman as Katie Cherry, was told by an insider that they met on the dating app Raya and have been 'dating for a few months.'

Their insider claimed that the actor and the musician are 'very into each other.'

The outlet reported that she studied film scoring at Berklee College of Music and works as a film composer.

A source told Dailymail.com that the movie star 'has dated over the past year but this is nothing that serious at this time.'

His relaxed outing stood in stark contrast to the way his night ended, when Katie was seen escorting a visibly worse-for-wear Ben out of a Halloween bash.

Happy: The pair looked relaxed and happy as they enjoyed each other's company at Starbucks

Close: The twosome looked close as they stood together to place their orders at the counter

In good company: The pair rested their helmets on the ground as they sat together at a table

The following day, he admitted to a 'slip' in his sobriety, but he vowed to not let it derail him.

Ben was seen arriving at ex-wife Jennifer Garner's house in the Pacific Palisades, California, on Sunday afternoon, just hours after sparking new sobriety concerns following a night out in Hollywood.

'Yes this was a stumble and he is working to get back on track,' an insider told Dailymail.com.

He seemed to be in good spirits despite the tough circumstances as he told photographers outside the property: 'Well you know it happens, it's a slip but I'm not going to let it derail me.'

The A-list actor appeared to have bounded back from the night before, stepping out in a light grey sweater paired with jeans.

Sobriety slip: Just hours later, Katie was seen escorting the star out of a Halloween party, after he suffered a 'sobriety slip'

Casually cool: The Hollywood screen star looked casually cool for the low-key outing, sporting a multicoloured motorcycle jacket with dark rinse jeans

He carried a massive cup of iced coffee from his favourite brand, Dunkin' Donuts, and wore a black chain around his wrist with a circular golden charm.

Hours before the visit at his ex's home, Ben had trouble walking and appeared to stumble against a vehicle, suffering a 'sobriety setback' after leaving a Halloween party on Saturday night in Los Angeles.

Ben wrapped his arms around his companion while the pair waited for a ride outside of the La Peer Hotel, which played host to the Unicef Masquerade ball.

He wore a white skeleton mask and a black suit and 'seemed to have fallen off the wagon' after he 'nearly fell before catching himself on the vehicle,' according to TMZ.

Blending in: The pair were engrossed in their conversation as they sat together on their date

Ride: They rode in on Ben's motorcycle, with Katie taking the passenger seat

While promoting a homeless charity over the weekend – before attending the party – the star revealed that he was dating once again, while also talking about his sobriety.

He wrote: 'HA, you got me. I'm dating. But let's be serious for a moment and talk about something that is actually important.

'I have been in recovery for over a year and part of that is helping out others. @themidnightmission is an incredible organization that helps those in need with housing, training, development, and recovery.

'I'm making a donation today because there are people battling addiction every day that don't have the resources and need help. @raya, you in? Who else is with me? Click the link in my bio to donate.'

Tough: Ben had trouble walking and appeared to stumble against a vehicle after leaving a Halloween party on Saturday night in Los Angeles

Still persevering: Ben's representative confirmed his setback to DailyMail.com, explaining, 'It was never as if this was simply behind him'

In a video from Saturday night, Affleck and Katie can be heard asking the driver: 'We're right here; Where are you?'

As the woman walks toward their vehicle, Ben stumbles and trips backward before grabbing on to the taillight of a waiting SUV.

After grabbing his footing, Ben made his way to the backseat of the vehicle where Katie was already sitting.

'Sobriety is difficult and elusive for everyone struggling with addiction, and we're told Ben has acknowledged he's going to slip up from time to time,' TMZ initially reported, with Ben's representative also confirming to DailyMail.com.

Out and about: On Monday morning, the actor was spotted out and about solo in Los Angeles

Conversation: The screen star chatted away on his phone as he made his way down the street

'It was never as if this was simply behind him.'

Ex-wife Jennifer Garner was at the ready to help Ben in August of 2018 as she staged an intervention before driving him to a rehab facility in Malibu.

'This week I completed a forty-day stay at a treatment center for alcohol addiction and remain in outpatient care,' Affleck wrote in a post in October. 'Battling any addiction is a lifelong and difficult struggle.'

TMZ reported that Ben has been attending 'wellness classes' in LA which focus on 'Buddhist ethics' and health body, mind and spirit.

Ex factor: The star was previously in an on-off relationship with Saturday Night Live producer Lindsay Shookus, until they split in April. Pictured in January 2018
